title: Closing of the National Park Service account on Twitter after Retwitts anti-tromp
subtitle: The Ministry of the Interior took action following the exchange of tweet through the National Park Service Account in an inappropriate manner compared to attendance at the Trump installation, however, in Obama.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The official accounts of the Ministry of the Interior were temporarily cancelled on Twitter after using the National Park Service account to rewrite negative information about the forthcoming Trump administration.
